sentences.en: ...dirt roads now churned into mud by the annual rains.
sentences.cn: …土路现在被一年一度的雨水搅和得一片泥泞。

sentences.en: A goose's wings churn the air and leave an air current behind.
sentences.cn: 一只大雁的翅膀扇动空气,在身后留下一股气流.

sentences.en: artists continued to churn out insipid works.
sentences.cn: 艺术家不断大量生产枯燥乏味的作品。

sentences.en: Butter is made by shaking up cream in a churn.
sentences.cn: 黄油是通过在搅拌桶里搅拌牛奶制成的.

sentences.en: churns out four novels a year.
Ferries churn the waters of Howe Sound from Langdale to Horseshoe Bay.
sentences.cn: 渡船搅起豪湾的海水，从兰代尔驶向霍斯舒湾。

sentences.en: He began to churn out literary compositions in English.
sentences.cn: 他开始用英文创作大量的文学作品。

sentences.en: He chased it outside and put more cream in the churn.
sentences.cn: 他把猪追赶到外面去,并加入更多的乳脂到搅拌器中.

sentences.en: However, the Devas could not churn the Ocean themselves.
sentences.cn: 然而, 天神本身并不能搅拌海洋.

sentences.en: Immersion coolers with chilled water circulation are often used for churn milk.
sentences.cn: 带有冷水循环系统的浸泡冷却品经常可以用来搅拌牛乳.

sentences.en: It knocked over the churn and began to drink the spilled cream.
sentences.cn: 它把搅乳器弄翻了,并开始喝那打翻的乳脂.

sentences.en: My stomach was churning on the day of the exam.
sentences.cn: 考试那天我胃里直翻腾。

sentences.en: Occasionally they slap the water with their tails or churn it up in play.
sentences.cn: 他们偶尔用尾巴拍打水面，或者搅着水玩儿。

sentences.en: Pour the mixture into an ice cream machine and churn until firm.
sentences.cn: 倒入混合成冰淇淋机和流失,直到坚定的.

sentences.en: Some pulp writers churn out two or three short stories a day.
sentences.cn: 有些低级杂志的作家每天粗制滥造地写出两三篇短篇小说.

sentences.en: Some pulp writers churn out two or three thousand words a day.
sentences.cn: 有些黄色杂志的撰稿人每天粗制滥造地写二,三千字.

sentences.en: The tractor churn ed up the soil.
They churn out 3 000 identical toy trains every day.
sentences.cn: 他们每天生产3000辆一式一样的玩具火车.

sentences.en: Watching the white people eat would make my empty stomach churn.
sentences.cn: 看着白人吃东西,我的空肚子就翻腾起来.

phrases.tran_cn: 大量产出：以一种丰富的和自动的方式产生
（尤指大批量）经常地（或机械地）产出

trans.tran_en: a container used for shaking milk in order to make it into butter
if your stomach churns, you feel sick because you are nervous or frightened

trans.tran_cn: 制造（奶油等），产生剧烈搅动
